name: Skullcrusher

skills.name: Smash
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Places a 50% [Heal Reduction] debuff if the target's DEF is lower than this Champion's.
Damage based on: [DEF]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +5%

skills.name: Stonewall
skills.raw_description:
Places a 50% [Ally Protection] buff on all allies except this Champion for 2 turns. Places a [Counterattack] buff on all allies except this Champion for 2 turns. Places an [Unkillable] buff on this Champion
Lvl. 2 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Unshakeable
skills.raw_description: Decreases the duration of all debuffs on this Champion by 1 turn. Occurs once per turn.
